nodes.description: 一名持AK-47的袭击者在伊斯坦布尔机场国际到达区行走，导致人们四散逃离。
nodes.support_text: In the video, which has not yet been independently verified, a man can be seen walking through the terminal building armed with an AK-47 as people flee in all directions.

nodes.description: 一名警察向袭击者开枪，袭击者倒地并掉落自动武器。
nodes.support_text: As he rounds a corner, a police officer opens fire, causing the attacker to fall and drop his automatic weapon.

nodes.description: 警察接近受伤的袭击者后突然转身逃跑。
nodes.support_text: The police officer can be seen approaching the wounded terrorist before abruptly turning and running away.

nodes.description: 袭击者引爆自杀式炸弹背心，引发巨大爆炸。
nodes.support_text: Moments later, the man appears to detonate his suicide vest, resulting in a large explosion.

nodes.description: 袭击者使用出租车进入机场，目标是国际到达区，该区域易于进入且无需通过安检。
nodes.support_text: The gunmen arrived in a taxi and targeted the Ataturk airport’s international arrivals area, which is easily accessible without passing through security checks.

nodes.description: 机场内的一起爆炸导致36人死亡，包括三名自杀式炸弹袭击者。
nodes.support_text: Turkish officials say the attack by three suspected Isis terrorists killed at least 41 people and wounded 239 others.

nodes.description: 机场内的一名目击者拍摄到公众在爆炸前处于混乱状态，随后所有人向一个方向奔跑。
nodes.support_text: A separate video, taken by a CCTV camera behind an information desk in the arrivals hall, showed members of the public apparently in a state of confusion before they all start running in one direction.

nodes.description: 爆炸发生在摄像机后，导致机场国际到达区出现破坏和伤亡。
nodes.support_text: Seconds afterwards there is an explosion, just off camera.

nodes.description: 政府官员表示死亡人数可能上升到近50人
nodes.support_text: 政府官员表示死亡人数可能上升到近50人
